page.title: 07COWBIT VILLAGE HALL
page.content: Mrs Millson is the caretaker of our village hall.She cleans the hall every night and after a social event.In the winter she works from 06.30hrs to 08.15hrs to light the coke stoves whereas in the summer she only works from 07.30hrs to 08.15hrs. In the hall there are 8 tables 6 benches and a chest of cups.If you want to borrow the cups you have to pay 25 pence and the tables 15 pence. The hall will seat 90 people. To hire the hall it costs Â£10.00 up until 22.00hrs and increases with time. The uses of the hall are for the Womens Institute, the playgroup, bingo, Parish Council, discos, dances, Tulip time events, garden fetes and school use.
